member.name: T:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql
member.summary: Implements PHP functions provided by MSSQL extension.

member.name: T:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.QueryResultKeys
member.summary: Query result array format.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.QueryResultKeys.ColumnNames
member.summary: Add items keyed by column names.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.QueryResultKeys.Numbers
member.summary: Add items keyed by column indices.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.QueryResultKeys.Both
member.summary: Add both items keyed by column names and items keyd by column indices.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.MSSQL_ASSOC
member.summary: Add items keyed by column names.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.MSSQL_NUM
member.summary: Add items keyed by column indices.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.MSSQL_BOTH
member.summary: Add both items keyed by column names and items keyd by column indices.

member.name: T:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.VariableType
member.summary: Types of variables bound to stored procedure parameters.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.LastConnection(Pchp.Core.Context)
member.summary: Gets last active connection.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_close(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Closes a specified connection.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_connect(Pchp.Core.Context,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Establishes a connection to SQL server using a specified server, user, and password and default flags.
member.param: Server (host). A null reference means the default value.
User name. A null reference means the default value.
Password. A null reference means the default value.
Whether to create a new link.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_pconnect(Pchp.Core.Context,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Establishes a connection to SQL server using a specified server, user, and password and default flags.
member.param: Server (host). A null reference means the default value.
User name. A null reference means the default value.
Password. A null reference means the default value.
Whether to create a new link.
member.returns: Resource representing the connection or a null reference (false in PHP) on failure.
member.remarks: Default values are taken from the configuration. Creates a non-persistent connection. Persistent connections are not supported.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_free_result(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Releases a resource represening a query result.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure (invalid resource).

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_select_db(Pchp.Core.Context,System.String,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Selects the current DB for a specified connection.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_query(Pchp.Core.Context,System.String,Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends a query to the current database associated with a specified connection.
member.returns: Query resource or a null reference (null in PHP) on failure.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_fetch_row(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a result row as an integer indexed array.
member.returns: Array indexed by integers starting from 0 containing values of the current row.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_fetch_assoc(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a result row as an associative array.
member.returns: Array indexed by column names containing values of the current row.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_fetch_array(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.QueryResultKeys)
member.summary: Get a result row as an array with a specified key format.
member.param: Type(s) of keys in the resulting array.
member.returns: Array containing values of the rows indexed by column keys and/or column indices depending on value of .

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_fetch_object(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a result row as an object.
member.returns: Object whose fields contain values from the current row. Field names corresponds to the column names.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_rows_affected(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get a number of affected rows in the previous operation.
member.returns: The number of affected rows or -1 if the last operation failed or the connection is invalid.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_num_fields(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get number of columns (fields) in a specified result.
member.returns: Number of columns in the specified result or 0 if the result resource is invalid.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_num_rows(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Get number of rows in a specified result.
member.returns: Number of rows in the specified result or 0 if the result resource is invalid.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_get_last_message(Pchp.Core.Context)
member.summary: Gets last error message.
member.returns: The message sent by server.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_min_error_severity(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a threshold for displaying errors sent by server. Not supported.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_min_message_severity(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets a threshold for displaying messages sent by server. Not supported.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_result(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32,Pchp.Core.PhpValue)
member.summary: Gets a contents of a specified cell from a specified query result resource.
member.param: Column (field) integer index or string name.
member.returns: The value of the cell or false on failure (invalid resource or row index).

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_next_result(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Fetches the next result set if the query returned multiple result sets.
member.returns: Whether the next result set is available.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_field_name(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Gets a name of the current column (field) in a result.
member.returns: Name of the column or a null reference on failure (invalid resource or column index).

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_field_name(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a name of a specified column (field) in a result.
member.returns: Name of the column or a null reference on failure (invalid resource or column index).

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_field_type(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Gets a type of the current column (field) in a result.
member.returns: MSSQL type translated to PHP terminology.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_field_type(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a type of a specified column (field) in a result.
member.returns: MSSQL type translated to PHP terminology.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_field_length(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Gets a length of the current column (field) in a result.
member.returns: Length of the column or a -1 on failure (invalid resource or column index).

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_field_length(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a length of a specified column (field) in a result.
member.returns: Length of the column or a -1 on failure (invalid resource or column index).

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_field_seek(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the result resource's current column (field) offset.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure (invalid resource or column offset).

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_data_seek(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the result resource's current row index.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure (invalid resource or row index).

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_fetch_field(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a PHP object whose properties describes a specified field.
member.returns: The PHP object.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_fetch_batch(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Not supported.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_init(Pchp.Core.Context,System.String,Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Inicializes a stored procedure of a given name.
member.returns: Statement resource representing the procedure.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_free_statement(Pchp.Core.PhpResource)
member.summary: Releases a resource represening a statement.
member.returns: true on success, false on failure (invalid resource).

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_bind(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.String,Pchp.Core.PhpAlias,Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.VariableType,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Binds a PHP variable to an SQL parameter of a statement.
member.param: PHP variable to bind to the parameter.
Whether the parameter is an output parameter.
Whether the parameter accepts null values.
member.returns: Whether binding succeeded.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_execute(Pchp.Core.PhpResource,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes a specified stored procedure statement.
member.param: Whether to retrieve and return procedure output.
member.returns: Result resource containing procedure output, true if the procedure succeeded yet doesn't return any value, or false on failure.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSql.mssql_guid_string(System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts 16 bytes to a string representation of a GUID.
member.param: Whether to return a short format.
member.returns: String representation of a GUID.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSqlConfiguration.Timeout
member.summary: Request timeout in seconds. Non-positive value means no timeout.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSqlConfiguration.ConnectTimeout
member.summary: Connect timeout in seconds. Non-positive value means no timeout.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSqlConfiguration.BatchSize
member.summary: Limit on size of a batch. Non-positive value means no limit.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSqlConfiguration.MaxConnections
member.summary: Maximum number of connections per request. Negative value means no limit.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSqlConfiguration.NTAuthentication
member.summary: Use NT authentication when connecting to the server.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSqlConfiguration.GetSet(Pchp.Core.Context,Pchp.Core.IPhpConfigurationService,System.String,Pchp.Core.PhpValue,Pchp.Library.StandardPhpOptions.IniAction)
member.summary: Gets or sets a value of a legacy configuration option.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.MsSqlConfiguration.RegisterLegacyOptions
member.summary: Registers legacy ini-options.

member.name: F:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.SqlConnectionManager.FailConnectErrorMessage
member.summary: Last failed connect attempt error message.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.SqlConnectionManager.GetInstance(Pchp.Core.Context)
member.summary: Gets the manager singleton within runtime context.

member.name: T:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbConnection
member.summary: SQL connection resource.

member.name: P:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbConnection.ActiveConnection
member.summary: Gets underlaying connection.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbConnection.#ctor(Peachpie.Library.MsSql.SqlConnectionManager,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new connection resource.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbConnection.GetResult(Pchp.Library.Database.ConnectionResource,System.Data.IDataReader,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a query result resource.
member.param: Data reader to be used for result resource population.
Whether to convert data types to PHP ones.
member.returns: Result resource holding all resulting data of the query.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbConnection.CreateCommand(System.String,System.Data.CommandType)
member.summary: Command factory.

member.name: T:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbProcedure
member.summary: Represets a stored procedure statement.

member.name: P:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbProcedure.ProcedureName
member.summary: Procedure name.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbProcedure.#ctor(Pchp.Library.Database.ConnectionResource,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a stored procedure statement.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbProcedure.Execute(System.Boolean,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Executes the procedure.
member.returns: Results or a null reference if results are not loaded or an error occured.

member.name: T:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbResult
member.summary: Represents a result of a SQL command.

member.name: P:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbResult.BatchSize
member.summary: Limit on size of a batch. Non-positive values means no limit.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbResult.#ctor(Pchp.Library.Database.ConnectionResource,System.Data.IDataReader,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates an instance of a result resource.
member.param: Data reader from which to load results.
Whether to convert resulting values to PHP types.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbResult.GetNames
member.summary: Gets an array of column names.
member.returns: Array of column names. If a column doesn't have a name (it is calculated), it is assigned "computed{number}" name.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbResult.GetValues(System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets row values.
member.param: Whether to convert value to PHP types.
member.returns: Row data.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbResult.ConvertDbValue(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a value from database to PHP value.
member.returns: PHP value.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbResult.MapFieldTypeName(System.String)
member.summary: Maps database type name to the one displayed by PHP.
member.returns: PHP name.

member.name: M:Peachpie.Library.MsSql.PhpSqlDbResult.IsNumericType(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether a type of a specified PHP name is a numeric type.
member.returns: Whether the type is numeric ("int", "numeric", or "real").
